participant_1.background:
I'm close to my family and enjoy reading and spending time at the beach.
i live in texas.
i cannot go a single day without eating ice cream.
i speak fluent german.
i love to surf.

participant_2.background:
My family is important to me, but my job is demanding and I don't always get to see them as much as I would like.
I don't mind the rain, because it helps me drown out my terrible singing voice.
In my free time, I like to go on road trips with my Ford truck.
I am a person who likes to express myself through tattoos and music.
i have been in band all four years of high school.

content.text: It's going well! Just got home from a long day at work.
Oh, what do you do for work?
That sounds like a demanding job. How do you like it?
It's definitely challenging, but it's also very rewarding. I get to help people and make a difference in their lives.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! What do you do for fun?
I like to read, go to the beach, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like fun! I love to read too. I'm currently reading a book about the history of Texas.
Oh, that sounds interesting! I've never been to Texas, but I've heard good things about it.
You should definitely go sometime! It's a beautiful state with a lot to offer.
Well, it was nice talking to you. I should probably get some sleep. I have to wake up early for work tomorrow.
Good night! Have a good sleep.
